project_abstract.cdata: Major components of the proposed project are: (a) construction of an earth dam and its appurtenant works on the Saigon River in the southwestern part of Viet Nam; and (b) construction of a gravity irrigation system for about 42,000 ha of currently rainfed land, including an adequate drainage network, inspection and access roads and two low-lift pumping stations to serve about 4,000 ha within the 42,000 ha service area. The project also makes provision for the engagement of experts for the dam review panel; training of construction engineers and heavy equipment operators and maintenance personnel; procurement of vehicles, equipment, and construction materials and supplies; and the preparation of a comprehensive program for agricultural supporting services.
